product_name: Suunto Ambit3 Peak GPS Multifunction Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: Whether you're aiming for a summit or a personal best time, the Ambit3 Peak is up for the adventure. It tracks heart rate and all the data you need to take your performance to the next level.
short_description: Whether you're aiming for a summit or a personal best time, the Ambit3 Peak is up for the adventure. It tracks heart rate and all the data you need to take your performance to the next level.
